panels.annotation: Full page splash - the temple revealed
panels.visual: A vast underground chamber opens before them - wet, mossy vines hanging from a ceiling lost in darkness. Among the vines stand statues of impossible forms, hewn from stone of colors no quarry ever produced, glittering with mineral inclusions that defy naming. They are watching. On the walls, alien writing covers every surface - script from no human civilization. At the far end, an altar. Behind it, a cyclopean figure with a single eye socket that drinks the light. The scale is overwhelming, ancient, profane.
panels.narration: And they were watching. Not moving, not breathing, but watching nonetheless.
